strength.description: A scalar parameter controlling the amount of occlusion applied. A value of `0.0` means no occlusion. A value of `1.0` means full occlusion. This value affects the final occlusion value as: `1.0 + strength * (<sampled occlusion texture value> - 1.0)`.
strength.short_description: A scalar multiplier controlling the amount of occlusion applied.
